title: Increase Expanded mind mastery from 5% mana to 10% mana.
body:
its very high up on utility mastery that no AP carry will use, and so i cant see it being that Op to have 10% more mana for sacrificing 3 mastery points for.  
As it is 5% mana is not worth 3 mastery points for utility.

replies.body: OP is secretly blitzcrank and ryze.

Back in S2, Utility was pretty legit for Ryze since the MPen was early enough in the tree to go with a full support tree and the rest into offensive. You were so tanky innately from the build that it didn't even matter if you had any in defensive. Them times were wonderful for Mid Ryze. Then again, Mid Eve also existed and both were mained by Alex Ich. 

I THINK RITO LIKES TO NERF ICH. #Illuminati
And even if he isn't he doesn't realize that doing this would force Ryze and Blitz players to choose the utility tree. Nothing else would be close to worth it.
Its very useful for casting supports
not really, 5% is not much, once u reach 1k mana that's only an extra 50mana.. which is why i think it shld be increased or reduce the amount of points needed to reach 5%

I wish.

This would really help the mana hungry supports. (Sona, Soraka, them secret galio support mains)
would rather not go back to S3 9/0/21 masteries for ap mids, meditation is good enough
I heard George Takei when I read this. And when they give a VU to Ryze I want George Takei to do the voiceover now...
It is far to late now for any mastery changes. They have been the same for a season and a half.
Masteries have been buffed/nerfed in the past around this time, tho mostly earlier
And we used to get new masteries every season, but it doesn't matter what happened before.
Then it doesn't matter if it's too late.

Then why does your comment even exist wtf?

LOL

For whatever reason Riot seems determined to make utility masteries have minimal impact every time they "rework" them. Maybe season 6 will have what.... the 3rd mastery rework? They've botched it every time as far as I'm concerned.
